author: dblevins
msg: EncReference.  Opened up access to java:comp/ejb
StatefulInstanceManager.  Greatly cleaned up the LRU queue and bulk
StatefulContainer.  Added logging, some better exception handling.
SimplePassivator.  Passivates instances to a temporary directory if a
sessions directory is not specified.  Logging statements added when
passivating and activating.  All important exceptions are logged.

author: dblevins
msg: StatelessInstanceManager.  Revised the pooling. Lots of logging was also
added.  [Task] The logging statement uses log4j directly, it should be
updated to use the logging interface instead.

author: dblevins
msg: Added the volitile keyword to some of the properties
